meanings.definition: A person or thing that orbits.
meanings.sent1: The orbiters circled around the planet.
meanings.sent2: The astronaut was one of the orbiters in space.
meanings.sent3: The orbiters played a game of ring-around-the-rosie.
meanings.sent4: The orbiters revolved like dancers around the star.
meanings.sent5: The orbiters moved gracefully in their circular path.

meanings.definition: A spacecraft or satellite that orbits a celestial body.
meanings.sent1: The orbiters sent back images of the Earth from space.
meanings.sent2: The orbiters were launched into orbit around Mars.
meanings.sent3: The orbiters had a great view of the galaxy from above.
meanings.sent4: The orbiters were like tiny moons circling the planet.
meanings.sent5: The orbiters collected data as they circled the moon.

meanings.definition: A group of people or objects that move around a central point or person.
meanings.sent1: The orbiters surrounded the leader in a protective circle.
meanings.sent2: The orbiters followed the teacher around the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The orbiters formed a human chain around the park.
meanings.sent4: The orbiters swirled around the speaker, eager to hear.
meanings.sent5: The orbiters rotated around the center like planets in a solar system.
